title: Can i make money making sculptures of champions?
body:
Ive fallen in  love with League of Legends and besides league, my main passion is art. Ive been considering creating a sculpture of my Main: Fizz for a few months now. I have started my sculpture, and when I complete it I want to try to sell it. However, I don't want to cause any like... copyright issues or whatever. Am I able to make a sculpture of a champion and sell it using the names Fizz and League of Legends? Or do I somehow have to make it an "off brand" of Fizz and LoL? Id like to give credit to League in my selling process through claim of the characters design and the actual game, however I just don't want to get sued because I wanted to bring my favorite champion to life through my art.

Thank you guys so much!

replies.body: The only recommendation I could offer here is to check out our[ legal jibber jabber ](https://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber)page.  This will have information on what's okay or possibly crossing the line.  For example, we're okay with most content as long as it's not showing the official riot logo or webcontent that's not freely available.  Be sure to check it out, and I hope it helps!
